sentences.sentence: We can also do angiograms and by that we can make the diagnosis early.
sentences.translation: 我们也可以用血管造影来早期诊断。

sentences.sentence: All aneurysms were not visualized and all bypasses remained patent in postoperative angiograms.
sentences.translation: 术后脑血管造影证实吻合口通畅，动脉瘤未见显影。

sentences.sentence: Coronary angiograms (X-Rays) of the patients in my study show an actual reversal of the disease.
sentences.translation: 心脏病患者的冠状动脉造影（X射线）显示经过我的治疗后，其病情显著好转。
